page.title: 14Housing In Our Area
page.content: From our Questionnaire we found that 66% of the People lived in houses owned by the Council. Approximately 24% of the houses were Flats. 65% of the houses had 3 bedrooms and the majority of the remaining houses had 2 bedrooms. Only 30% of the houses had a Shower. The main method of cooking was by Electric Cooker. (Electricty 80%). Approximately 30% of the houses were heated by Storage Heating and 30% by Central Heating. 20% of the houses were heated by Coal Fire. Only 14% of the houses had Garage while 79% of the houses had a Garden. In our Survey 76% of the were happy with the house they lived in. The things which People most liked were the situation of their house, having a garden and having privacy.
